verses.roman:
"sākṣāt īśvara tumi vrajendra-nandana
tomāra niśvāse sarva-veda-pravartana

synonyms: sākṣāt īśvara tumi—You are the Supreme Personality of Godhead; vrajendra-nandana—the son of Mahārāja Nanda; tomāra niśvāse—by Your breathing; sarva-veda—all Vedic literatures; pravartana—are vibrated.
translation: Sanātana Gosvāmī said, "My dear Lord, You are the Supreme Personality of Godhead, Kṛṣṇa, the son of Mahārāja Nanda. All the Vedic literatures are vibrated through Your breathing.
